<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 1"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Irrepressible (Ganzi)](/Feats.aspx?ID=7201) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Nephilim" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=518" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [War of Immortals](/Sources.aspx?ID=232) pg. 53

</column>

---

Your slight otherworldly nature allows you to easily brush off emotional manipulation. When you roll a success on a save against an emotion effect, you get a critical success instead.
name: Irrepressible (Ganzi)
